title: Conversations With Lord Byron On Perversion, 163 Years After His Lordship's Death
description: New York:: Atheneum,, 1987.. Fine in fine dust jacket.. First US printing. A witty and elegant novel, this is an account of a perhaps surprisingly sucessful experiment with Artificial Intelligence, in which everything known about the romantic poet was fed into a computer in an attempt to uncover the real truth about his life. 174 pp.
author: Amanda Prantera
